input_email_body:
Subject: Inquiry into Pricing for Blackboard Learn Integration

Respected Customer Support, I am writing to ask about the pricing for integrating Blackboard Learn into your SaaS project management solution. Could you kindly give me a detailed outline of the associated costs? Additionally, it would be helpful to know if there are extra services or features included in the integration deal My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. Moreover, I am interested in learning about any discounts provided for long-term deals or bulk purchases. I look forward to your response. Thank you for your support and time. You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.
